Description:
Perfect Family Living Inside and Out!
With its original appeal and quality enhancements throughout, this Modern single-level home presents a ready-to-enjoy lifestyle opportunity in a family-focused neighbourhood. The light-filled interior comprises four bedrooms (all with robes) stylish master en suite and a main bathroom with double vanity & bathtub to accommodate three other bedrooms. In the hub of the home, you will discover a spacious open plan lounge/dining area and a kitchen that is fitted with beautiful white cabinetry and stainless steel cooking appliances.
With the comfort of ducted heating and split system cooling this home will keep you feeling comfortable in all seasons!
Location wise it is just a short drive to Hunt Club Village shopping Center, Westfield Fountain Gate, child care Centers and easy access to the Monash Freeway and South Gippsland Highway.
Insights: 21 Stark Circuit, Cranbourne East VIC 3977 was last sold in 2020 and 153 other 4 bedroom house in Cranbourne East have recently been sold.

Close to schools, sporting facilities and much more.

Ready to build your ideal home now
Located next to Mayfield Estate and in the convenience of great facilities around like Casey Stadium and Casey RACE swimming centre, Balla Balla Community Centre, Cranbourne Library, nearby shopping centres, schools. Set in the heart of Cranbourne east, surrounded by parklands and reserves, with easy access to other major arterials roads like south gippsland hwy and monash freeway, this fabulous opportunity is not to be missed.
- Close to shops and Medical Facilities
- Land size 376sqm
- Titled and ready to build
- Established primary and secondary schools nearby
Please see the below link for an up-to-date copy of the Due Diligence Check List: http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
TITLED BLOCK - READY TO BUILD
A generous 420m2 (approx.) titled block in ever popular EAST estate, offers the perfect opportunity to build your dream home.
Location is the key when deciding for your family home or an investment. This block is ideally positioned close to amenities including:
- Walking distance to the bus stop.
- M1 and Shopping Centres are just 10 mins away.
- Hunt Club Village Shopping ,Springhill & Thompson Park Shopping Centres a
short 3 mins.
- Carlisle Park Primary School, Springhill Drive Early Learning & Medical Centre
just minutes away.
- Recreational and sporting facilities such as Cranbourne Racecourse, Casey
Fields Tennis Courts and Carlisle Park are at your fingertips.
Hurry !!! This opportunity cannot be missed.
Dimensions: 14 x 30
For further information call SUKHDEEP SINGH on 0412 003 466 or SAM SINGH on 0403 134 009
NOTE LINK FOR DUE DILIGENCE CHECKLIST: http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
YOUR HOUSE HUNT IS COMPLETE!
Great family living in this perfectly presented home situated only minutes from Hunt Club Village Shopping Centre, Public transport, multiple Primary and Secondary Schools, Chisholm Tafe, Childcare and Medical facilities.
This delightful family home has much to offer. Comprising of 3 generous bedrooms all with built-in robes, and master complete with ensuite.
Open plan living, with the kitchen being the central hub between the 2 living areas and formal dining.
Gourmet kitchen complete with stainless steel appliances and dishwasher provides a practical work space, exceptional storage, ideal for the entertainer!
Accommodating family and friends will be effortless with the duel living areas and flow through to the large undercover pergola area perfect for those summer BBQ's
This beautiful home has many features suited to even the most discerning of buyers.
- Ducted heating
- Evaporative cooling
- Neutral colour palette
- Freshly painted
- Laminate timber floors
- Spacious laundry
- Generous main bathroom
and double garage just to mention a few.
* Private inspections only.*
Please call or text to book your inspection
Internal area
215.99m²

Description:
The Missing Piece To Your Property Puzzle
*SET DATE SALE 18/02/20 @ 6.00pm (unless sold prior)
A well-designed family home offering exceptional comfort and lifestyle advantages located within the Parks Edge Estate awaits you. Effortlessly combining family living and entertaining alongside everyday functionality. Three generous bedrooms each comprise a built-in wardrobe, whilst the master suite offers a walk-in wardrobe and a light filled ensuite featuring a double vanity and oversized shower ensuring style and comfort.
Two large separate living rooms further enhance the extensive floorplan including a highly functional central kitchen showcasing stone benchtops, 900mm Oven and 6 burner gas cook top, dishwasher, vast walk-in pantry, plus an island bench for added versatility.
Just a hop and a skip for the children to enjoy all the excitement on offer at Casey Fields and Casey RACE Aquatic Centre. Im bored will be unspoken words within this household! If education is also high on the list of importance for your family, within walking distance the new primary school is scheduled to open this year as well as having various nearby schools including Cranbourne Primary School, Cranbourne Secondary, Lighthouse Christian College, Saint Thomas Apostle Catholic Primary School and Marnebek School.
Aspiring entertainers are certain to make avid use of the accommodating yet low maintenance outdoor area, the perfect setting for spending those hot days and warm evenings hosting family and friends. This perfect package includes so many additional features it is impossible to list them all, some of these being 15 West facing Solar panels, secure side access, double lock up garage with internal access, ducted heating, Samsung Smart Wi-Fi air conditioner head unit including a 2 Fan system base unit, 5 way split TV antenna and NBN connectivity complete this outstanding property.
Insights: 7 Heales Road, Cranbourne East VIC 3977 was last sold in 2020 and 93 other 3 bedroom house in Cranbourne East have recently been sold.

Description:
Investment Opportunity Not to Be Missed!
This one year old townhouse in the much sought-after East Estate in Cranbourne East will surely impress. Overlooking hectares of parkland, this family-sized home demands an inspection as there is nothing to do which is perfect for your next investment.
Secured with a good tenant, locked in until September 2020, you can always be assured of a strong rental return whilst appreciating great capital growth over the coming years in this ever-growing suburb.
Designed, built and constructed by none other than Wolfdene, this home oozes quality, finesse and grandeur. The lower level consists of the master bedroom with full ensuite and large built in robe along side the spacious European laundry and the internal access from the double garage.
As you make your way up to level 2 you are then greeted by this huge open plan kitchen/family area which overlooks the balcony. The kitchen comes with quality kitchen appliances, Caesar stone bench tops and plenty of storage. Bedroom two and three are carpeted and comes with large and spacious built-in robes and is serviced by the well-appointed second bathroom and toilet.
To keep you and your family comfortable during Melbourne's severe weather conditions, this home comes with evaporative cooling and ducted heating. If you are looking for community living then this home in its present location is a perfect example of just that. Surrounded by parklands, walking tracks, schools and shopping, this home will not disappoint.
Hurry to inspect !!!

Description:
Vogue Style In The East!
This Ocean inspired Simonds family home is situated in the prestigious Livingstone Estate. Once you step in the door, you can't help but feel at home, featuring 3 bedrooms, spacious master bedroom has a full ensuite & WIR and BIRs for the other bedrooms. This home will suit any family, first home buyer or even someone who is downsizing. The open plan living zones offer a large family & dining area with plenty of room for the growing family. All of this is centered by a fantastic kitchen with stainless steel appliances and walk in pantry. As you flow from the kitchen you're greeted with a stylish outside low maintenance spacious rear yard with outdoor spa, great for the entire family, and will be sure to impress friends and family.
Other features in this home include ducted heating, evap cooling, downlights, and double garage. The location of this quality home is second to none with the park a minute walk from your door, and only a short walk from the surrounding Cranbourne schools as well as public transport, Casey fields football ground which has lakes and parks and Casey Race Recreation & Aquatic Centre, and Casey Library.
Features:
- 3 large Bedrooms, the Master with full ensuite.
- Ducted heating, evap cooling, landscaped gardens.
- Kitchen with, stainless steel oven and plenty of cupboard & bench space & walk in pantry
- Quality light fittings
- Remote lock up double garage with internal access
- Carpeted bedrooms

Description:
HUNTERS GREEN LIFESTYLE VILLAGE!
HUNT CLUB ESTATE - Retirement living at its best! Perfectly positioned close to all amenities. This spacious 2 bedroom home must be inspected quickly as it shouldn't last long.
Features a spacious living area upon entry, a modern kitchen with quality appliances, plenty of bench & cupboard space, 2 good sized robed bedrooms and central bathroom, also ducted heating & cooling for year round comfort.
There is a private, low maintenance rear yard with available space for a pergola, also a single garage with rear access and is located close to all the village has to offer.
Inclusion of the Village include: Arts & Craft, Library, Billiard/Snooker Table, Bowling Green, Community Centre, Emergency Call System, Exercise/Fitness, Health and Beauty, Indoor Social/Recreation, Internet, Outdoor Social/Recreation, Swimming Pool & Visiting Health Professional Workshop.
The Hunt Club is a multi-award winning estate offering numerous parks, Hunt Club Wetlands, walking and bicycle paths as well as a complete range of childcare, primary (Cranbourne East Primary) and secondary schools (Cranbourne East Secondary College).Walking distance to Shopping centre and cafes, restaurants.
For all enquiries call John Lauretta

Description:
FAMILY LIVING IN CASCADES ON CLYDE!
Located in the picturesque Cascades on Clyde estate sits this astonishing 4 bedroom delight, boasting three generous sized living spaces!
A top tier home in a top tier estate, with an array of separate living zones, elegant outdoor entertaining area with alfresco, this exquisite residence is sure to suit any family.
The hostess kitchen is complete with quality stainless steel appliances including a 600mm range hood, 5-burner gas cook top, large pantry, tiled splash back not to mention ample overhead storage and bench space. All of this overlooking your separate meals & living zone!
Step through your sliding doors and be greeted by fully decked alfresco area, this will provide the perfect setting to entertain family and guests of all sizes or to simply retire after the long working week.
Surrounded by top end properties and is within walking distance to picturesque wetlands, this home boasts convenience. Other estate features include Class- A recycled water ensuring lush gardens year round, over 14 hectares of parkland and public open space, public BBQ facilities, playgrounds and walking tracks.
Those who are business savvy will appreciate this Telstra smart community positioned within a short drive to all amenities located in the townships of Berwick, Clyde and Cranbourne. Minutes away from freeway access en route to the Melbourne CBD, the popular Clyde Primary School, Casey Fields football ground/Casey Race aquatic centre and the Town Centre. Not to mention just seconds away from the Selandra rise shopping centre.
From front to back this home was completed with an exceptional eye for detail and will be the perfect residence for those that expect nothing but the best!
BOOK AN INSPECTION TODAY, IT MAY BE GONE TOMORROW! - *PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS*

Description:
This is THE ONE!
Its not often youre able to have high end low maintenance living but still have the capacity for trailer, boat or caravan access! Here you have all that and more!
Nestled proudly on a raised corner block in Cranbourne East is 2 Ferrari Drive. A home with it all!
Boasting 3 generous bedrooms including the master with a HUGE walk in robe and ensuite while the further 2 bedrooms are also very large, with built in robes and serviced by a large stylish family bathroom with separate toilet.
The first of 2 living areas is a massive front lounge that gives a real sense of space as soon as you enter the home. Moving through to the kitchen/living/dining zone youre treated to spectacular caeserstone counter tops, 900mm gas cooker and a MASSIVE walk in pantry! The dining and living areas really add to the zone as a whole with room for your dining table and a second place to sit and relax with an outlook to the rear yard.
The rear yard is a whole other level of AMAZING! The undercover entertaining space is more than enough to entertain large groups of guests and all remain undercover! This one really is perfect for someone that loves to entertain! Also in the rear yard is gated access perfect for a tradie with a trailer, a fisherman with a boat or someone that likes to keep their caravan at home!
Further comfort features include: Gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling and just in case you need it there is even a split system plus the BONUS of 18 solar panels to help with the pesky power bills.
Its not often we can say a low maintenance home has THE LOT but in this case it actually does!
Being close to multiple shopping centres, a selection of schools, the Casey Fields sporting complex, not far to public transport but still has the privacy of being in a quiet street in a lovely little pocket of Cranbourne East.
2 Ferrari Drive is an absolute MUST INSPECT! Bring your checklist and tick all the boxes! CALL TODAY!

Description:
A Home Designed To Suit Every Family!
If you are a first home buyer, investor or looking to downsize, this is the perfect opportunity for you to get in quick.
This gorgeous, light filled and neat four-bedroom home has all the modern conveniences you desire. Boasting a lavish master bedroom with private ensuite and walk in wardrobe, whilst remaining three bedrooms are generously proportioned and complemented by built in robes and the stylish family bathroom.
As you walk in you will be pleasantly surprised by the colour tones, quality fittings, fixtures and the floor plan. The heart of this home is the incredibly impressive and tastefully designed kitchen with quality appliances and excellent amount of cupboard and bench space with built-in pantry.
Beyond the kitchen, you will find the family living / dining area which has all the space required for easy entertaining as well as a second living area/rumpus room. Easy access to outside which offers low maintenance gardens and grassed backyard for the kids to play.
This fabulous family home offers so many extras:
- Two living areas
- Remote controlled double garage with internal access
- Ducted heating
- Split system air conditioner
- Solar hot water system
- Downlights
Mayfield estate is the place to be due to the close proximity to amenities. The beautiful parks and walking tracks offer plenty of space to explore, Casey fields and Casey RACE are only a stone throw away and all this is only a moment's drive to local schools.

CRANBOURNE EAST: Wanting to be in a location that is family orientated, has easy access to all local amenities? then this is the block for you. This is definitely a great opportunity so take advantage and buy with confidence today!
This block is perfect to create your dream home or add to your property portfolio whilst enjoying the quality lifestyle on offer in East Estate! This titled parcel of land measures app. 420m2. With plenty of award winning designs to pick from any builder would have a huge selection of floor plans sure to suit your current situation! What are you waiting for? Contact your builder today and get ready to start pouring the slab!
A quality community, Cranbourne East offers you the perfect escape right in the heart of Casey. With an array of shopping, community and education choices at your fingertips, this is the perfect place to call home complete with a picturesque central park NBN ready optic fibre
Within a short drive to freeway access and all amenities located in the townships of Berwick, Clyde and Cranbourne this sensational opportunity is only minutes away from the popular Clyde Primary School, Casey RACE Recreation & Aquatic Centre and Casey Indoor Sports Centre! With further shopping precincts in Pasadena, Selandra Rise/Cascades on Clyde and The Hunt Club, local amenities are always going to be close by whilst the recently revamped Cranbourne Centro Shopping Centre offers an abundance of cafes and restaurants! Those of you who work or enjoy wining and dining in the CBD will certainly appreciate the nearby freeway facilities, it's only a brisk app. 45 minute drive away!
MAKE AN ENQUIRY TODAY, IT MAY BE GONE TOMORROW!
Please note that land map and dimensions are approximant only and the buyer should make their own enquires.

Description:
PROPERTY BACK ON MARKET!!
You'll feel a sense of calm as soon as you walk through the front door of this inviting home. Smart design, a contemporary aesthetic and neutral palette all add to the appeal of this 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom family home.
An open layout combined with a seamless indoor/outdoor flow make entertaining a breeze. The kitchen/living/dining space leads out onto an expansive alfresco, the ideal space to enjoy BBQS/meals with friends and family. The alfresco is further extended by a paved backyard, making this space hugely functional. An additional lounge acts as the perfect family room for movie nights and relaxation. The kitchen features quality appliances including a dishwasher, ample bench and cabinet space, a breakfast bar and large pantry.
The master includes a WIR and beautifully finished en suite, while the additional bedrooms are spacious with BIRs. The family bathroom features a bath and shower with a separate toilet and laundry.
The home is light filled with large windows in every room making it feel light an airy, while the low maintenance garden, with large shed means minimal maintenance and more free time.
Main features include:
- Huge alfresco ideal for entertaining
- Open kitchen/dining/living space with alfresco access
- Additional family room for relaxation
- Four bright bedrooms with large windows
- Two gorgeous bathrooms with separate WC and laundry
- Gorgeous timber floors, carpet and tiles throughout
- Split units and central heating
- Landscaped garden with large shed
- Double garage with alfresco access
Located on quiet street in a sought-after Cranbourne neighbourhood, this home is the right choice for first home buyers, investors and families looking for their forever home. With amenities like Casey Grammar School, Casey Stadium, Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre, Casey Indoor Leisure Complex all within close vicinity, you couldn't get a better location.
If you're looking for a tranquil lifestyle then this home is for you. Get in touch with our team to book an inspection today!

Description:
**SOLD BY MATTHEW RINGERI**
HUNT CLUB ESTATE, CRANBOURNE EAST: In what was the first of many estates creating the Cranbourne East we know and love today, this pristine home is set in the heart of the ever popular Hunt Club precinct. Positioned in a very quiet street only a short walk from parks and lakes with the local shopping centre and both Cranbourne East primary and secondary schools also only moments away.
Perfect for a growing family, this Dennis Family property offers something that many modern developments don't have - land! Set on around 662m2 this package is complete with an abundance of rear yard space, a huge decked pergola ideal for weekend entertaining plus a generous grassed side yard that is a welcome addition for those needing a secure place for kids and pets to roam!
Inside, the property itself is beautifully presented and features a front formal lounge as well as a stone and stainless equipped hostess kitchen that sits within the vast family/dining room underlined with timber flooring. There are 4 robed bedrooms including the master complete with a walk in wardrobe and a lovely ensuite to complement the family bathroom. Added benefits include ducted heating, 2 split system air conditioners plus a 4.5kW solar array with a bonus battery storage system. The remote double garage even has convenient internal access!
Within close proximity to walking/bike paths, the Hunt Club is a multi-award winning development offering a complete range of education facilities, including a childcare centre. Buses constantly weave through the estate and don't forget the future plans for a Cranbourne East railway station.
Centrally located to freeways and public transport enroute to the Melbourne CBD, the location is second to none. For those of you who like to stay closer to home, it's only a brisk drive to the Cranbourne Park shopping centre, Berwick Village and the Fountain Gate shopping precinct. Within close vicinity to an array of additional primary, secondary and tertiary institutions, the entire family will have easy access to the very best in entertainment, education and recreation!
BOOK AN INSPECTION TODAY, IT MAY BE GONE TOMORROW - PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS!
Our floor plans are for representational purposes only and should be used as such. We accept no liability for the accuracy or details contained in our floor plans.
All of the property details noted were current at the time of publishing. Due to private buyer inspections, the status of the sale may change prior to pending Open Homes. As a result, we suggest you confirm the listing status before inspecting.

Description:
Price to Please
(1P3276)
Welcome to one of the most well-presented homes weve had to offer for a long time. This Porter Davis-built home has been beautifully designed and offers an opportunity for dual living perfect for extended family. Set in a lovely quiet court location this home offers 4 large bedrooms, spacious lounge and family room, rumpus/games room which could also be converted to a fifth bedroom. The ensuite and bathrooms are an absolute delight. The kitchen is one of an excellent design offering ample class, stone bench tops, 900mm stainless steel stove, range hood, dishwasher and huge walk-in pantry plus other extras.
There is a multitude of high quality fixtures & fittings throughout this home.
Outside there is a magnificent alfresco decking area overlooking your very own private gardens with many established fruit trees. There is a good size double garage and solar panels making it an extremely energy efficient home.
Be quick to inspect this home, owners are motivated to sell and have priced home to sell.
Internal area
497m²
